ChestLVBenchPressH.name: Lever Bench Press (plate loaded)
ChestLVBenchPressH.preparation: Lie supine on bench with chest under lever bar. Grasp lever bar with wide oblique overhand grip.
ChestLVBenchPressH.execution: Press bar until arms are extended. Lower weight to upper chest. Repeat.
ChestLVBenchPressH.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

ChestLVBBBenchPress.name: Lever Barbell Bench Press (plate loaded)
ChestLVBBBenchPress.preparation: Lie supine on bench with upper chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar.
ChestLVBBBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.
ChestLVBBBenchPress.comments: Orientation relative to lever will depend upon height of fulcrum relative to bench. Position body so bar is over shoulders during extension, yet lower on chest in lowest position. Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

ChestLVChestDipH.name: Lever Chest Dip (plate loaded)
ChestLVChestDipH.preparation: Sit on seat and grasp handles with oblique grip. If possible, place handles in wide position. Lean forward slightly.
ChestLVChestDipH.execution: Push lever down with elbows away from body. Return until chest is slightly stretched. Repeat.
ChestLVChestDipH.synergists: latissimusdorsi, pectoralisclavicular, tricepsbrachii, levatorscapulae, teresmajor, deltoidanterior, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

ChestLVChestPressH.name: Lever Chest Press (plate loaded)
ChestLVChestPressH.preparation: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
ChestLVChestPressH.execution: Press levers until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.
ChestLVChestPressH.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

ChestLVDeclineChestPressH.name: Lever Decline Chest Press (plate loaded)
ChestLVDeclineChestPressH.preparation: Sit on seat with handles lower chest height. Grasp handle with wide overhand grip elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
ChestLVDeclineChestPressH.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.
ChestLVDeclineChestPressH.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Latissimus Dorsi involvem ent is low on Decline Bench Press (Barnett 1995). Also see exercises performed on alternative machine. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

ChestLVDeclineChestPressPL.name: Lever Decline Chest Press (plate loaded)
ChestLVDeclineChestPressPL.preparation: Sit on seat with lever grips lower chest height. Grasp grips with wide overhand grip elbows out to sides just below shoulders.
ChestLVDeclineChestPressPL.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.
ChestLVDeclineChestPressPL.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Latissimus Dorsi involvement is low on Decline Bench Press (Barnett 1995). Also see exercises performed on Hammer Machine. Also see Bench Press Analysis.

ChestLVWideGripChestPress.name: Lever Wide Grip Chest Press (plate loaded)
ChestLVWideGripChestPress.preparation: Sit on seat with chest approximately height of handles. Grasp handles with wide overhand grip and elbows out to sides.
ChestLVWideGripChestPress.execution: Press lever until arms are extended. Return weight until chest muscles are slightly stretched. Repeat.
ChestLVWideGripChestPress.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.
